description.value:
You can cast the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-1.WH828JD6WRDOM2M3]{Tame Beast} spell once per long rest. 
You can use your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Presence as your spellcasting attribute when casting spells this way.
If you are a spellcaster, you can add this spell to your spell list. They are always prepared and do not count against the spells you can prepare each day.
